keel.Algorithms.ImbalancedClassification.ImbalancedAlgorithms.GP_COACH_H

Class DataBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.ImbalancedClassification.ImbalancedAlgorithms.GP_COACH_H.DataBase

  • public class DataBase
extends java.lang.Object

    Title: DataBase

    Description: This class contains the representation of a Fuzzy Data Base

    Copyright: Copyright KEEL (c) 2007

    Company: KEEL

    Since:
    JDK1.5
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataBase

        public DataBase()
        Default constructor

      • DataBase

        public DataBase(int n_variables,
                int n_labels,
                double[][] rangos,
                java.lang.String[] names,
                int n_layer)
        Constructor with parameters. It performs a homegeneous partition of the input space for a given number of fuzzy labels.
        Parameters:
        n_variables - int Number of input variables of the problem
        n_labels - int Number of fuzzy labels
        rangos - double[][] Range of each variable (minimum and maximum values)
        names - String[] Labels for the input attributes
        n_layer - Number of the layer of this data base (lowest layer value is 1)

    • Method Detail

        It returns the number of input variables

        int the number of input variables

        public int numLabels()

        int the number of fuzzy labels

      • membershipFunction

        public double membershipFunction(int i,
                                 int j,
                                 double X)
        It computes the membership degree for a input value
        Parameters:
        i - int the input variable id
        j - int the fuzzy label id
        X - double the input value
        Returns:
        double the membership degree

      • clone

        public Fuzzy clone(int i,
                   int j)
        It makes a copy of a fuzzy label
        Parameters:
        i - int the input variable id
        j - int the fuzzy label id
        Returns:
        Fuzzy a copy of a fuzzy label

      • updateFuzzyLabels

        public void updateFuzzyLabels(double[][] tuning_matrix)
        Updates the fuzzy labels stored in the current database according to a lateral tuning given
        Parameters:
        tuning_matrix - Double matrix codifying the lateral tuning that needs to be applied to the current fuzzy values

      • printString

        public java.lang.String printString()
        It prints the Data Base into an string
        Returns:
